member.name: T:HttSoft.FrameFunc.TaskbarNotifier
member.summary: TaskbarNotifier allows to display MSN style/Skinned instant messaging popups

member.name: M:HttSoft.FrameFunc.TaskbarNotifier.Show(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Displays the popup for a certain amount of time
member.param: The string which will be shown as the title of the popup
The string which will be shown as the content of the popup
Duration of the showing animation (in milliseconds)
Duration of the visible state before collapsing (in milliseconds)
Duration of the hiding animation (in milliseconds)

member.name: M:HttSoft.FrameFunc.TaskbarNotifier.SetBackgroundBitmap(System.String,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Sets the background bitmap and its transparency color
member.param: Path of the Background Bitmap on the disk
Color of the Bitmap which won't be visible

member.name: M:HttSoft.FrameFunc.TaskbarNotifier.SetBackgroundBitmap(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Sets the background bitmap and its transparency color
member.param: Image/Bitmap object which represents the Background Bitmap
Color of the Bitmap which won't be visible

member.name: M:HttSoft.FrameFunc.TaskbarNotifier.SetCloseBitmap(System.String,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Sets the 3-State Close Button bitmap, its transparency color and its coordinates
member.param: Path of the 3-state Close button Bitmap on the disk (width must a multiple of 3)
Color of the Bitmap which won't be visible
Location of the close button on the popup

members.member:
Sets the 3-State Close Button bitmap, its transparency color and its coordinates
Image/Bitmap object which represents the 3-state Close button Bitmap (width must be a multiple of 3) Color of the Bitmap which won't be visible /// Location of the close button on the popup Nothing
